summary: Add a standalone tanky spellsword follower. SeveNBase - UNP - UNPB - CBBE. CME_Save included
descriptionHtml:
[center][font=Georgia][size=6]Introduction[/size][/font]

Hello !
[i]
[size=2]English is not my native language[/size][/i]

Leiyane is a pretty versatile spellsword : she can use Ice / Fire / Shock spells, she's also a bit tanky, she mainly wear heavy armors, she still have some perks for light armors along with some sneak perks. She's standalone that mean you need nothing else for her appeareance to show like in my screenshots, the elf ears are removeable, simply unequip if you dont like them.
I recommend using [b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/15524/?]AFT[/url][/b] or another follower manager mod.

She's available with 4 body types and 2 textures variant : uncompressed (Quality) or compressed (Performance).
If you have any issue with uncompressed, like too much vram usage, low-end pc or whatever, grab the other one under optional tab.


[font=Georgia][size=3]
Thanks to Hodilton[/size][/font]

[youtube]CvPIaroCWtU[/youtube]

[font=Georgia][size=3]
[/size][/font][font=Georgia][size=5]Location [/size][/font]

You can find her in Dragon Bridge Inn, near Solitude (Screenshot in image section).

[font=Georgia][size=5]
Requirement[/size][/font]

[font=Georgia][size=4]N[/size][/font]one
(Expect obviously [size=2]Skyrim version 1.9.32+[/size])


[font=Georgia][size=4]
CME_Slot[/size][/font]

How to install :

Place my CME_save in this folder

Documents>My Games>Skyrim>cme_save

Race : Breton

Slot 23

If you want her to look exactly like mine you need :

Fair Skin Complexion
(i still use version 7.6 Uncompressed)

The Eyes of Beauty
(Nenuphar Eyes)

Eye Normap Map Fix

KS Hairdos
(Google it)

SG female eyesbrows

Nouserheres Ears
(Ears 07)


All links below at Credit section



[b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36992/?]
[/url][/b][b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13722/?][/url][/b][font=Georgia][size=5]Details [/size][/font]

Name : Leiyane

Level : Up with the player (1.00)

Marriageable : Yes

Essential : Yes

Body : SeveNBase / UNP / UNPB / CBBE ( Height 0.96 - Weight 100 )

Default Outfit:

- Elven Armor

- Elven Sword

[font=Georgia][size=5][/size][/font]

(Left Hand)

Iron Flesh
Ebony Flesh[/i]

[color=#ffffff]
[font=Georgia][size=5]Last Words[/size][/font][/color]

[/color]Feel free to comment, add screenshots, ask questions.
I think i'll work a bit more on this follower (like adding dialogues/custom voice) but NOT now, i'll need some times D:

Hope you'll have fun and she'll be useful for u :p[/center]
